Check out some of the sweet features that come out-of-the-box."}]},{"kind":"ol","meta":{"start":"1"},"children":[{"kind":"li","children":[{"kind":"","content":"Built in React for minimal overhead and cruft"}]},{"kind":"li","children":[{"kind":"","content":"Compiles to static file generation and avoids complex hosting"}]},{"kind":"li","children":[{"kind":"","content":"Wrapped by Next.js to keep the door open for server side rendering and more"}]},{"kind":"li","children":[{"kind":"","content":"Leverages Markdown formatting so that your content is transferrable and sustainable"}]},{"kind":"li","children":[{"kind":"","content":"Provides mobile-first experience with layout and design"}]},{"kind":"li","children":[{"kind":"","content":"Provides SEO best practices with metadata tags, opengraph configuration, and more"}]},{"kind":"li","children":[{"kind":"","content":"Provides default syndication with RSS"}]}]}],"author":"Josh Wang","title":"This Blog's Source Code","description":"Yes, the source code that this very blog extends","tags":["github","source","code","blog","react","nextjs","markdown"],"links":["https://github.com/jwango/blog-react"],"files":[],"lastUpdateDate":"2020-05-28T23:23:37.437-04:00","publishDate":"2020-05-28T22:43:43.345-04:00"}
